title: Shards
description: In the AftermathAnatole, the madman who paradoxically helped her remain sane, is dead. Her hated sire, Archbishop Moncada, was slain by her ex-lover, the Assamite assassin Fatima. Lucita is an assassin herself, and one who did much to change the course of the Sabbat's advance in the Eastern United States. But in these modern nights, she finds herself alone and wandering. The direction she chooses will come as a great surprise, even to those knowledgeable in the intrigues of the World of Darkness "RM." Especially those knowledgeable ones...
author: Bruce Baugh
